languages.text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор погружен в изучение карт звездных систем и отчетов, громоздящихся на столе устрашающими горными хребтами. Под глазами, безжалостно препарирующими очередной доклад, залегли тени, а под кожей проступили кости черепа. Не поворачивая к вам головы, Калькасар устало изрекает:{/n} "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. Вы прибыли как нельзя кстати".

{n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."
languages.original_text: {n}Лорд-инквизитор погружен в изучение карт звездных систем и отчетов, громоздящихся на столе устрашающими горными хребтами. Под глазами, безжалостно препарирующими очередной доклад, залегли тени, а под кожей проступили кости черепа. Не поворачивая к вам головы, Калькасар устало изрекает:{/n} "Приветствую, Ваша Светлость. Вы прибыли как нельзя кстати".

There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

languages.text: {n}大审判官卡尔卡扎正在全神贯注地研究着星图与报告。这些文件堆积在他的桌子上，仿佛一座巨大山脉的山脊。他的双眼挂着黑黝黝的眼袋，冰冷的目光不带感情地分析着最新的报告，脸上的皮肤似乎被头骨绷得紧紧的。他没有将头转向你，而是以疲惫的语调向你开了口。{/n}“向你致意，领主大人。你来得正是时候。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎审判长正在全神贯注地研究着星图与报告。这些文件堆积在他的桌子上，仿佛一座巨大山脉的山脊。他的双眼挂着黑黝黝的眼袋，冰冷的目光不带感情地分析着最新的报告，脸上的皮肤似乎被头骨绷得紧紧的。他没有将头转向你，而是以疲惫的语调向你开了口。{/n}“向你致意，领主大人。你来得正是时候。”

languages.text: {n}El Lord Inquisidor está absorto en una serie de mapas de sistemas estelares e informes amontonados sobre su escritorio como una formidable cordillera. Sus ojos, rodeados de profundas ojeras, recorren el informe más reciente y la tensión de su piel es palpable. Sin girarse hacia ti, Calcazar te saluda en tono cansado.{/n} «Salve, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Llega en el momento idóneo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

Sus ojos, rodeados de profundas ojeras, recorren el informe más reciente y la tensión de su piel es palpable. Sin girarse hacia ti, Calcazar te saluda en tono cansado.{/n} «Salve, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Llega en el momento idóneo».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは、険しい山脈の尾根さながらに机の上に集められた星系図と報告書をあらためることに没頭している。くまをつくった両目で最新の報告書を容赦なく分析しており、肌は頭蓋骨を覆ってピンと張りつめているようだ。こちらに顔を向けることなく、カルカサルは疲れをあらわに話す。{/n}「ごきげんよう、陛下。完璧なタイミングだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターは、険しい山脈の尾根さながらに机の上に集められた星系図と報告書をあらためることに没頭している。くまをつくった両目で最新の報告書を容赦なく分析しており、肌は頭蓋骨を覆ってピンと張りつめているようだ。こちらに顔を向けることなく、カルカサルは疲れをあらわに話す。{/n}「ごきげんよう、陛下。完璧なタイミングだ」

languages.text: {n}Le seigneur inquisiteur est plongé dans l'étude de cartes du système stellaire et de rapports, empilés sur le bureau pour former la crête d'une spectaculaire chaîne de montagnes. Ses yeux cernés épluchent âprement le document le plus récent et sa peau semble tendue sur les os de son crâne. Sans se tourner vers vous, Calcazar annonce avec lassitude :{/n} « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Vous arrivez à point nommé. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

Ses yeux cernés épluchent âprement le document le plus récent et sa peau semble tendue sur les os de son crâne. Sans se tourner vers vous, Calcazar annonce avec lassitude :{/n} « Salutations, Votre Seigneurie. Vous arrivez à point nommé. »

languages.text: {n}Der Großinquisitor ist mit dem Studium von Grafiken und Berichten über Sternensysteme beschäftigt, die wie eine gewaltige Gebirgskette auf dem Tisch aufgetürmt sind. Unter seinen Augen, mit denen er schonungslos den aktuellsten Bericht analysiert, sind Schatten zu sehen, und seine Haut wirkt eng über die Knochen seines Schädels gezogen. Ohne dir den Kopf zuzuwenden, sagt Calcazar müde:{/n} "Seid gegrüßt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Euer Timing ist perfekt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu, masanın üzerine koca sıradağların sırtlarını andırır gibi yığılmış yıldız sistemi haritalarını ve raporları incelemekle meşgul. Çökmüş gözleriyle son raporu didikliyor. Kafa derisi, kafatasına sıkıca oturtulmuş gibi duruyor. Calcazar, bitkin bir ses tonuyla başını sana çevirmeden konuşmaya başlıyor. {/n} "Selamlar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Muazzam bir vakitte geldin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor is engrossed in studying star system charts and reports, which are amassed on the desk like the ridges of a formidable mountain range. There are shadows beneath his eyes, which are ruthlessly dissecting the latest report, and his skin seems stretched taut over the bones of his skull. Without turning his head to you, Calcazar says wearily,{/n} "Greetings, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Your timing is impeccable."
